name: CalWORKs/Welfare-to-Work (WTW)
short_desc: Prepares and assists CalWORKs clients to obtain and keep employment through Welfare-to-Work activities
description: CalWORKs recipients, unless exempt, are required to participate in Welfare-to-Work activities as a condition of eligibility for cash benefits.Welfare-to-Work activities prepare CalWORKs participants to obtain and keep employment through a variety of activities, including orientation, assessment, vocational training, adult education services, job club/job search, and work experience/community service.
